privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: VasCruz Group LLC is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our commercial intermediation services.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.content: We collect various types of information to provide our commercial intermediation services effectively and improve your experience.
items: Personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and company details
Business requirements and preferences for service matching
Website usage data and interaction patterns
Communication records including inquiries and correspondence
Technical information such as IP address and browser type

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: Your information helps us provide better services and support your business needs.
items: To provide commercial intermediation services and connect you with business opportunities
To communicate with you about services, updates, and business opportunities
To improve our services, website functionality, and user experience
To comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements
To protect our rights and prevent fraud or abuse

sharing.title: How We Share Your Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data only in specific circumstances.
items: With your consent, we may share information with trusted business partners for service provision
With service providers who assist in our operations under strict confidentiality agreements
When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
In connection with business transfers or mergers, with appropriate safeguards
With regulatory authorities when legally required

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
items: Encryption of all data using industry-standard security protocols
Strict access controls and authentication procedures
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Employee training on data protection and privacy practices
Incident response procedures for data breaches

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information and how it is used.
items: Access your personal information and request a copy of your data
Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
Request deletion of your personal information in certain circumstances
Object to processing of your data for specific purposes
Withdraw consent for data processing where applicable

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites and encourage you to review their privacy policies.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: VasCruz Group LLC, 3530 Mystic Pointe Drive Apt 2403, Aventura, Florida, 33180, USA

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.introduction: These terms and conditions govern your use of VasCruz Group LLC's commercial intermediation services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: These terms and conditions constitute a legally binding agreement between you and VasCruz Group LLC. By accessing or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: VasCruz Group LLC provides commercial intermediation services to connect businesses with opportunities, partners, and markets.
items: Business matching and partnership facilitation
Market analysis and business intelligence
Consultation and advisory services
Network development and relationship building
Business opportunity identification and evaluation

obligations.title: User Obligations
obligations.content: As a user of our services, you have certain responsibilities and obligations.
items: Provide accurate and complete information about your business and requirements
Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your business activities
Maintain professional standards in all business interactions
Respect the confidentiality of information shared through our platform
Use our services only for lawful and legitimate business purposes

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.content: VasCruz Group LLC provides commercial intermediation services on an 'as is' basis. While we strive to provide accurate and reliable information, we cannot guarantee the success of any business relationship or transaction. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of VasCruz Group LLC or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written consent.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at any time, with or without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these terms or is harmful to other users or our business. You may also terminate your use of our services at any time by discontinuing use.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated terms on our website. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida, United States. Any disputes arising from these terms will be resolved in the courts of Miami-Dade County, Florida.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: VasCruz Group LLC, 3530 Mystic Pointe Drive Apt 2403, Aventura, Florida, 33180, USA

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.introduction: This cookie policy explains how VasCruz Group LLC uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized services on our website.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences, analyze how you use our site, and provide personalized content and services. Cookies do not contain personal information and cannot access files on your device.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content: We use different types of cookies for various purposes to improve your experience.
items: Essential cookies required for basic website functionality and security
Analytics cookies that help us understand how visitors use our website
Functional cookies that remember your preferences and settings
Marketing cookies that provide personalized content and advertisements
Performance cookies that help us optimize website performance

usage.title: How We Use Cookies
usage.content: We use cookies to provide you with a better browsing experience and to improve our services.
items: To remember your preferences and settings
To analyze website traffic and usage patterns
To provide personalized content and recommendations
To improve website functionality and performance
To ensure security and prevent fraud

management.title: Managing Cookies
management.content: You have control over how cookies are used on your device.
items: You can control cookies through your browser settings and preferences
We obtain your consent before using non-essential cookies
You can opt out of third-party cookies through their respective platforms
You can delete cookies from your device at any time
Some website features may not work properly if cookies are disabled

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Some third-party services may also use cookies on our website.
items: Google Analytics and similar services for website analytics
Social media platforms for sharing and engagement features
Payment processors for secure transaction processing
Advertising networks for personalized advertisements
Customer support tools for enhanced service delivery

consent.title: Cookie Consent
consent.content: We respect your privacy and provide you with control over your cookie preferences. You can manage your cookie settings at any time through your browser settings or by contacting us.

changes.title: Changes to Cookie Policy
changes.content: We may update this cookie policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: VasCruz Group LLC, 3530 Mystic Pointe Drive Apt 2403, Aventura, Florida, 33180, USA

accessibility.title: Website Accessibility Statement
accessibility.introduction: VasCruz Group LLC is committed to making our website accessible to all users, including those with disabilities. We believe that accessibility is not just a legal requirement but a fundamental aspect of providing excellent customer service.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We continuously work to improve the accessibility of our website and ensure compliance with accessibility standards. Our goal is to provide an inclusive experience that allows all users to access our services effectively.

standards.title: Accessibility Standards
standards.content: We follow established accessibility guidelines and standards to ensure our website is accessible to users with various disabilities.
items: Compliance with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA
Adherence to Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act requirements
Ensuring compliance with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) standards
Following international accessibility standards and best practices
Regular accessibility audits and testing with assistive technologies

features.title: Accessibility Features
features.content: Our website includes various features to enhance accessibility for users with disabilities.
items: Full keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements
Compatibility with screen readers and assistive technologies
High contrast mode and customizable color schemes
Ability to increase text size without losing functionality
Alternative text for images and descriptive link text

assistance.title: Getting Assistance
assistance.content: We provide multiple ways to get help with accessibility issues and ensure all users can access our services.
items: Direct contact with our accessibility support team
Comprehensive accessibility documentation and guides
Easy-to-use feedback system for accessibility issues
Alternative contact methods including phone and email
Regular accessibility training for our staff

technical.title: Technical Requirements
technical.content: Our website is designed to work with various assistive technologies and browsers.
items: Compatibility with major screen readers including JAWS, NVDA, and VoiceOver
Support for keyboard-only navigation and voice commands
Responsive design that works across different devices and screen sizes
Fast loading times and optimized performance for assistive technologies
Regular testing with users who have disabilities

testing.title: Testing and Evaluation
testing.content: We regularly test our website for accessibility using automated tools, manual testing, and feedback from users with disabilities. We are committed to continuous improvement and welcome feedback on accessibility issues.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Manufacturers, distributors and buyers trust our experience in commercial intermediation to connect their businesses globally.

items.name: Carlos Mendoza
items.text: Incredible experience working with Vascruz Group. They helped us connect with distributors in Europe that we had never considered. Our sales increased by 40% in just 6 months. The team is very professional and always responds quickly.

items.name: MarÃ­a GonzÃ¡lez
items.text: We have been working with them for 2 years and the truth is that they have transformed our business. They facilitated strategic alliances that allowed us to expand into markets that seemed impossible. Highly recommended.

items.name: Roberto Silva
items.text: Their market analysis was key to our growth. They identified opportunities that we didn't see and guided us step by step. The results exceeded our expectations. We will definitely work with them again.

items.name: Ana RodrÃ­guez
items.text: Good service overall. Their negotiation experience helped us close more favorable contracts. Although communication could sometimes be faster, the final result was excellent.

items.name: Luis PÃ©rez
items.text: Thanks to Vascruz Group we were able to expand to Asia with great confidence. Their knowledge of the international market is impressive. They saved us a lot of time and costly mistakes. Very grateful.

items.name: Carmen Torres
items.text: The team is super dedicated and professional. They exceeded all our expectations from day one. The attention to detail and service personalization is what we liked most. We recommend them without hesitation.

items.name: Diego Morales
items.text: We have been working together for 3 years and they keep getting better. Their intermediation allowed us to form strategic alliances that completely transformed our business model. Our profitability increased significantly.

items.name: Patricia Vega
items.text: Good work in contract negotiation. Their experience in international markets allowed us to optimize costs and improve our margins. The process was a bit longer than expected, but it was worth it.

items.name: Fernando Ruiz
items.text: Vascruz Group has been fundamental for our international growth. Their network of contacts is invaluable and their experience has saved us many headaches. They are true experts in what they do.

items.name: Pablo Salazar
items.text: Excellent service from the first contact. The team is very professional and knows the market very well. They helped us identify new business opportunities that we hadn't seen. Very satisfied.

items.name: Laura MartÃ­nez
items.text: Incredible experience with Vascruz Group. They helped us open markets in Africa that seemed impossible. Their local knowledge and network of contacts is impressive. We definitely recommend them.

items.name: Ricardo Herrera
items.text: Good work overall. Their commercial intermediation allowed us to connect with quality suppliers. Although the initial process was a bit slow, the results were satisfactory.

categories.title: Our Service Categories
categories.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive range of commercial intermediation services designed to connect your business with global opportunities.

items.title: Commercial Representation
items.description: We represent manufacturers and distributors in national and international markets, facilitating strategic commercial connections.

products.title: Basic Representation
products.description: Essential commercial representation service for small to medium businesses.
products.detailedDescription: Our basic representation service provides essential support for businesses looking to establish their presence in new markets. We connect you with qualified buyers and handle initial negotiations to get your business relationships started.

products.title: Premium Representation
products.description: Comprehensive representation service with dedicated account manager and priority support.
products.detailedDescription: Our premium representation service offers comprehensive support with a dedicated account manager who works exclusively with your business. This service includes advanced market research, strategic planning, and priority access to our global network of buyers and distributors.

products.title: Enterprise Representation
products.description: Full-service representation for large enterprises with custom solutions and dedicated team.
products.detailedDescription: Our enterprise representation service is designed for large companies requiring comprehensive market presence and strategic growth. This service includes a dedicated team of experts, custom market strategies, and exclusive access to our premium buyer network.

items.title: Analysis and Logistics
items.description: Detailed market analysis and logistics process optimization to maximize operational efficiency.

products.title: Market Research Report
products.description: Comprehensive market analysis report for your target markets and industries.
products.detailedDescription: Our comprehensive market research report provides deep insights into your target markets, including detailed analysis of market size, growth trends, competitive landscape, and regulatory environment. This report serves as the foundation for informed business decisions and strategic planning.

products.title: Logistics Optimization
products.description: Complete logistics analysis and optimization for cost reduction and efficiency improvement.
products.detailedDescription: Our logistics optimization service analyzes your entire supply chain to identify inefficiencies and cost-saving opportunities. We provide actionable recommendations for route optimization, warehouse efficiency, and technology integration to maximize your operational performance.

products.title: Cost Analysis & Optimization
products.description: Detailed cost analysis and optimization strategies for maximum profitability.
products.detailedDescription: Our cost analysis and optimization service provides detailed insights into your cost structure and identifies opportunities for improvement. We develop customized strategies to optimize profitability while maintaining quality and service standards.

items.title: Global Business Development
items.description: International expansion strategies and new market development for sustainable growth.

products.title: Market Entry Strategy
products.description: Comprehensive market entry strategy for international expansion.
products.detailedDescription: Our market entry strategy service provides a comprehensive roadmap for entering new international markets. We analyze market opportunities, assess risks, and develop a detailed implementation plan with clear milestones and success metrics.

products.title: Global Market Entry Package
products.description: Complete package for entering new international markets with full support and guidance.
products.detailedDescription: Our comprehensive market entry package includes everything needed to successfully enter new international markets. From initial research to launch support, we provide end-to-end guidance and implementation support.

products.title: Growth Strategy Development
products.description: Strategic growth planning and opportunity identification for sustainable business expansion.
products.detailedDescription: Our growth strategy development service helps businesses identify and capitalize on growth opportunities. We develop comprehensive strategic frameworks that align with your business objectives and market conditions.

items.title: Key Alliances
items.description: Creation and management of strategic alliances that boost business growth and competitiveness.

products.title: Partnership Development
products.description: Strategic partnership identification and development for business growth.
products.detailedDescription: Our partnership development service helps businesses identify and establish strategic partnerships that drive growth and competitive advantage. We provide comprehensive support from initial identification through agreement execution.

products.title: Strategic Alliance Development
products.description: Comprehensive service for developing strategic partnerships and business alliances.
products.detailedDescription: Our strategic alliance development service provides comprehensive support for creating and managing strategic business alliances. We help identify opportunities, assess strategic fit, and develop sustainable alliance structures.

products.title: Business Network Development
products.description: Development of strategic business networks and industry connections.
products.detailedDescription: Our business network development service helps businesses build and optimize strategic networks of industry connections, partners, and collaborators. We provide systematic approaches to network building and relationship management.

items.title: Constant Innovation
items.description: Implementation of innovative solutions and emerging technologies to maintain competitive advantage.

products.title: Innovation Strategy
products.description: Development of innovation strategies and technology roadmaps for competitive advantage.
products.detailedDescription: Our innovation strategy service helps businesses develop comprehensive innovation roadmaps and technology integration plans. We assess current capabilities and design strategies to maintain competitive advantage through innovation.

products.title: Technology Integration
products.description: Strategic technology integration and digital transformation support.
products.detailedDescription: Our technology integration service provides comprehensive support for implementing new technologies and digital transformation initiatives. We ensure smooth integration with minimal disruption to business operations.

products.title: Process Innovation
products.description: Process improvement and innovation for operational excellence.
products.detailedDescription: Our process innovation service helps businesses identify and implement process improvements that drive operational excellence and competitive advantage. We focus on sustainable improvements that deliver measurable results.

items.title: Strategic Expansion
items.description: Comprehensive advisory for business expansion with focus on emerging markets and growth opportunities.

products.title: Strategic Planning
products.description: Comprehensive strategic planning for business expansion and growth.
products.detailedDescription: Our strategic planning service provides comprehensive analysis and planning for business expansion and growth. We develop detailed roadmaps that align with your business objectives and market opportunities.

products.title: Emerging Market Entry
products.description: Specialized support for entering emerging markets with comprehensive risk management.
products.detailedDescription: Our emerging market entry service provides specialized support for businesses looking to expand into emerging markets. We offer comprehensive risk management and local expertise to ensure successful market entry.

products.title: Risk Management & Mitigation
products.description: Comprehensive risk assessment and mitigation strategies for business expansion.
products.detailedDescription: Our risk management and mitigation service provides comprehensive risk assessment and strategy development for business expansion. We help identify potential risks and develop effective mitigation strategies.
